name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-08.03.2020
changelog: Fixed launching the camera by double-clicking the power button
The area of pressing the button to clear the recent has been fixed
Added bootmenu

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-17.02.2020
changelog: Choosing the action for a long press of the home button
Google Services bug fixed
Change the Wi-Fi MAC address and hostname
Video camera format changed from 3gp to mp4
Close All button in recent
HID mode removed

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-31.01.2020
changelog: Fixed inaccessibility of Voice Match (Ok Google)
Unlock friezes fixed
Fixed disabling the Cellular data always active item

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-26.01.2020
changelog: Redone recovery mode selection menu
When reset to factory settings through the item in the settings, the recovery automatically changes to stock
Redone the menu physical buttons
The brightness of the pictures in the camera is slightly increased
USB modem mode fixed
Fixed pop-up menu in the dialer
Vibration of action with a long press physical buttons
Checkbox Download and install in OTA updates

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-12.01.2020
changelog: Add Network Socket Request Manager
Enable App Ops
Battery saver for all system applications
Ability to disable most system applications
FM-Radio without headphones
Improved scrolling lists in settings

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-25.12.2019
changelog: Added 2G/4G network mode
Added custom network mode switching tile
Added incremental call to call

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-09.12.2019
changelog: Turn off notifications from Wi-Fi Calls
Updated Emoji
Fixed the behavior of physical buttons
Background cleanup fixed
In background cleaning, the ability to remove from recent has been added and the choice of delay time has been expanded
Returned stock File manager
Added line net.hostname=BV6000 to build.prop

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-03.12.2019
changelog: Dark theme updated
Added Lineage File Manager
Added left button switch
Fix night mode settings in Sytem UI Tuner
Battery fixes in power saver mode
All camera models added RAW shooting
Fixed bug with blurry image

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-29.11.2019
changelog: Added VOLTE/IMS
Theme settings are moved to the screen settings and work the same way in supported applications
Fixed changing font size when switching dark mode
Added support for NTFS (read-only), exFAT, f2fs file systems
Removed File Manager
Fixed not turning on the sensor when resetting the second call

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-20.11.2019
changelog: The ability to disable touch buttons with tiles in the curtain
The ability to disable the user icon in the open curtain
Change OTA server

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-18.11.2019
changelog: Cursor control with volume buttons
Change shortcuts on the lock screen
Navbar inclusion tile
Battery statistics are displayed from 0 percent

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-15.11.2019
changelog: Phone number in call recording file name
Fixed night mode
Fixed screen translation
Added the ability to enable navbar
Disabled EPDG
A2DP bitrate value returned by default
In the kernel added wireguard

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-09.11.2019
changelog: Fixed functionality of physical buttons
Added aptX codec
Increased bitrate sound via bluetooth default
Added switching to an alternative SBC codec and increasing bitrate

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-30.10.2019
changelog: Fixed functionality of physical buttons
Added USB Keyboard app
In the standard camera application, you can turn on the maximum brightness of the backlight

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-26.10.2019
changelog: Missing security patches added
Physical button settings items merged
Reworked and improved functionality of physical buttons
Removed applications sending data to Chinese servers and not having source
The kernel has been updated to the latest vanilla version (3.18.140)
Added HID input devices (keyboard and mouse)
Minor bugs fixed

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-01.09.2019
changelog: Fixed TTL fix mode by default
Fixed default delay for flashlight
Fixed closing the application by holding the back button
CPU/GPU performance control in the settings menu
Muteable camera shutter sound
Continuous shooting supplemented with 20 and 10 frames

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-26.08.2019
changelog: TTL fixation value selection
Updated dark theme and expanded list of supported applications
Returned stock applications of the calendar, calculator, contacts and messages

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-23.08.2019
changelog: Added perfservice mode switch
Fixed display of the file name and icons in the System update settings item with a dark theme applied
Removed the search bar in the launcher
resolv.conf is read from the root of internal memory

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-19.08.2019
changelog: The hosts file is read from the root of internal memory
Fixed 2G switching tile in dual SIM mode
Fixed display of Background task clear in the settings when a dark theme is applied
Disabled perfservice
TTL commit enabled by default

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-16.08.2019
changelog: Multisim 2G only tile
The date format in the conversation recording files is returned as in stock (yyyy-MM-dd_HH.mm.ss)
Ability to disable percent icon in battery text style
Fixed battery text color when charging is less than 15 percent
Added custom hosts file with ad blocking, сspam, and more
Messages and Contacts are replaced by Google
Added dark theme

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-14.08.2019
changelog: The statusbar is fixed when the red color is off in power saving mode
Fixed change recovery function
Added tile to switch to 2G Only mode (when disable, returns the previous network type)
Added grayscale tile
Added option to delay cleaning background applications
The date format in the conversation recording files was changed and the extra digits at the end of the file were removed
An item has been added to the update menu to open the list of changes on 4pda.ru
In the phone settings, checkboxes are replaced by switches
Fixed some menu items

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-09.08.2019
changelog: Fixed Russian translation
The ability to install OTA via TWRP
Added closing the active application by holding the Back button with the choice of holding time
Added automatic call recording

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-08.08.2019
changelog: Seven icons in a half-open curtain
Choosing the location of the clock in the status bar
Clock application returned from stock
Ability to enable/disable the red status bar in power saving mode
The ability to quickly change the recovery (stock/TWRP) from the settings

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-01.08.2019
changelog: Fixed increased battery consumption
Advanced PTT button selection
Protection from turning on NFC from the curtain when the screen is locked
Setting the frequency of the button backlight flashing during notifications
Button illumination notification when the battery is fully charged

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-28.07.2019
changelog: Added battery style icon selection
Music control gestures work in most applications
The camera button works in most applications
Small fixes in the PTT button
Fixed pressing the menu button in the button test mode
Update Russian translation

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-26.07.2019
changelog: Removed arrows in Wi-Fi icon in statusbar
The button Mark as read is added to the notification message
The ability to change large network type icons in the statusbar
The ability to change the launch of the assistant by swipe to the left on the lock screen, to start the Phone

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-23.07.2019
changelog: Fix TTL in kernel
Network traffic monitor
Frequency corrected, small undervolting

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-17.07.2019
changelog: Added tile on/off blue protection mode
Added tile enable/disable processor information
Changed the algorithm for holding the PTT button for on/off flashlight
Variable number of tiles in the quick settings

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-11.07.2019
changelog: Display bluetooth battery status when available in statusbar and QS Tile
Add ToolBox instead Compass
Add Cpu overlay
Set default governor to conservative instead interactive

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-04.07.2019
changelog: Added adjust the overall strength of vibration
Added disabled full screen InCallUI
Disable VILTE
Video quality format WxH
Video photo filename format dd.MM.yyyy_HH-mm-ss
Icon H+ in statusbar

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-24.06.2019
changelog: Fixing autorotation when off from the QS tile
Correction of the non-inclusion of the button illumination when pressing the app switch button
Notification backlight buttons

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-21.06.2019
changelog: Fixed actions to the PTT button
Added actions for torch in screen on
Fixed Voice Match in Google app
Gesture V replace torch
Configure dalvik in build.prop
Fixed Marathon mode in Battery Saver
Fixed Russian translate
Added vibrate for screen gesture
Added Rotation modes
Added button backlight settings
Added disabled dialog on battery full

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-19.06.2019
changelog: Fixed Power Saving Mode/Battery Profiles
Added more actions to the PTT button

name: s12v55_jk_3m-ota-15.06.2019
changelog: Fix potentials memory leakages
Added advanced selection of network type
Units hPa (hPa/mbar) added to Compass
Removed background file in Camera weighing almost 4mb
Added icon to switch auto brightness in status bar
Minor fix for LTE network level display in status bar
